verses.text: \w The|strong="H7291"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* fleeth, \w when|strong="H5127"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* pursueth: \w but|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H7291"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w bold|strong="H0982"\w* \w as|strong="H7291"\w* \w a|strong="H0369"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*, \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* dread.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* sins \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* wisdom \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w those|strong="H0120"\w* things \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w*, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* life \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w prolonged|strong="H0748"\w*.

\w A|strong="H0369"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w that|strong="H4306"\w* oppresseth \w the|strong="H6231"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, \w is|strong="H0369"\w* like \w a|strong="H0369"\w* violent shower, \w which|strong="H3899"\w* bringeth \w a|strong="H0369"\w* famine.

\w They|strong="H5800"\w* that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w*: \w they|strong="H5800"\w* that \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w it|strong="H8104"\w*, \w are|strong="H7563"\w* incensed \w against|strong="H8104"\w* \w him|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w Evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* think \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, take notice \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* simplicity, \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w crooked|strong="H6141"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* keepeth \w the|strong="H0995"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H0995"\w* wise \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: but \w he|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* feedeth gluttons, shameth \w his|strong="H5341"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7235"\w* that heapeth \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w riches|strong="H1952"\w* \w by|strong="H1952"\w* \w usury|strong="H8636"\w* \w and|strong="H5392"\w* loan, gathereth \w them|strong="H6908"\w* for \w him|strong="H6908"\w* that will be bountiful \w to|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H6908"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*.

\w He|strong="H8451"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* turneth \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* deceiveth \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w just|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H7686"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w own|strong="H5157"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7451"\w*: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* goods.

\w The|strong="H0995"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* seemeth \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w himself|strong="H0376"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0995"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w prudent|strong="H0995"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w search|strong="H2713"\w* \w him|strong="H0995"\w* \w out|strong="H2713"\w*.

\w In|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* joy \w of|strong="H8597"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* there \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*: \w when|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* reign, \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* ruined.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* hideth \w his|strong="H3808"\w* sins, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w confess|strong="H3034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3034"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H7355"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* obtain \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w* fearful: \w but|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

As \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w roaring|strong="H5098"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, \w and|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* hungry \w bear|strong="H1677"\w*, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* prince \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3117"\w* \w prince|strong="H5057"\w* void \w of|strong="H3117"\w* prudence \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* oppress \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* calumny: \w but|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* hateth covetousness, \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \w his|strong="H8130"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w A|strong="H5704"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* doth violence \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w*, if \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w will|strong="H0120"\w* stay \w him|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* walketh \w uprightly|strong="H8549"\w*, shall \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*: \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* perverse \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H5307"\w* \w once|strong="H0259"\w*.

He that tilleth \w his|strong="H5647"\w* \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, shall \w be|strong="H0127"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: \w but|strong="H5647"\w* he that followeth idleness shall \w be|strong="H0127"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3808"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0530"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* praised: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* maketh \w haste|strong="H0213"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w respect|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* person \w in|strong="H5921"\w* judgment, doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w*: \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* forsaketh \w the|strong="H6440"\w* truth.

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* maketh haste \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* rich, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* envieth others, \w is|strong="H0376"\w* ignorant \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w poverty|strong="H2639"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H3956"\w* rebuketh \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* favour \w with|strong="H3198"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*, more than \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H3956"\w* \w by|strong="H0120"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* flattering \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* deceiveth \w him|strong="H0310"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* stealeth \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w thing|strong="H1931"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w or|strong="H0369"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* saith, \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* sin, \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* partner \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0369"\w* murderer.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* boasteth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* puffeth \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*, stirreth \w up|strong="H5921"\w* quarrels: \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* healed.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H4422"\w* own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H1980"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*: \w but|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* walketh \w wisely|strong="H2451"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w saved|strong="H4422"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* giveth \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w want|strong="H4270"\w*: \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* despiseth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* entreaty, \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* suffer indigence.

\w When|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* themselves: \w when|strong="H7235"\w* they \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, \w the|strong="H6965"\w* lust \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*.
